long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save jobs from Indeed and LinkedIn to dedicated job application board in your Notion with one click. Serve as a smart assistant for job hunters who don't have much time on organising and managing job applications. 
Features include: 
* A minimalistic and clean Notion template that is ready to be used for job application tracking.
* Automatically save job title, location, company, etc to your Notion database
* Yes we have AI, it will extract the key points from the job description and save it to your Notion database
* Important dates will be synced automatically to Notion Calendar
